ttp_template:
<group name="num_flags_ip_address_mac_address_interface">
 {{NUM}} {{FLAGS}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{MAC_ADDRESS | re("[0-9a-fA-F:.-]+")}} {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="num_ip_address_mac_address_interface">
 {{NUM}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{MAC_ADDRESS | re("[0-9a-fA-F:.-]+")}} {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="num_ip_address_mac_address">
 {{NUM}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{MAC_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="num_ip_address_interface">
 {{NUM}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="num_flags_ip_address">
 {{NUM}} {{FLAGS}} {{IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Flags: X - disabled, I - invalid, H - DHCP, D - dynamic, P - published, C - complete
 #    ADDRESS         MAC-ADDRESS       INTERFACE
 0 DC 10.160.1.230    12:34:56:78:90:AA ether2
 1    10.152.1.230    12:34:56:78:90:AB ether5
 2    10.152.1.231    12:34:56:78:90:AC
 3    10.152.1.232                      ether4
 4 DC 10.152.1.233
textfsm_template:
Value NUM (\d+)
Value FLAGS ([XIHDPC]+)
Value IP_ADDRESS (\S+)
Value MAC_ADDRESS ((?:[0-9a-fA-F]{2}:){5}[0-9a-fA-F]{2})
Value INTERFACE (\S+)

Start
  ^\s*Flags:\s+X\s+-\s+disabled,\s+I\s+-\s+invalid,\s+H\s+-\s+DHCP,\s+D\s+-\s+dynamic,\s+P\s+-\s+published,\s+C\s+-\s+complete\s*$$
  ^\s*#\s+ADDRESS\s+MAC-ADDRESS\s+INTERFACE\s*$$ -> EntriesTable
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error

EntriesTable
  ^\s*${NUM}(?:\s+${FLAGS})?\s+${IP_ADDRESS}(?:\s+${MAC_ADDRESS})?(?:\s+${INTERFACE})?\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*(?:\d{2}:){2}\d{2}\s+echo:\s*.*$$
  ^\s*$$
  ^. -> Error
